landing.rules_a: You cannot change the player Name in middle of the game.
landing.rules_b: Total 16 question stand between you and 7 crore rupees starts from 1,000 rupee.
landing.rules_c: [Break Points]: There are 2 breakpoints at question 5 and question 10 which gaurentees minimum amount of money you get.
landing.rules_d: You can quit at any time of the game before answering the question.
landing.rules_e: Time limit only exist for first question 10 after that there wont be any time limit.
landing.rules_f: You will have 30 second and 45 second  of time limit to answer your question untill you reach 1st and 2nd break point respectively.
landing.rules_g: Wrong answer will get you last break point price unless you quit with current price amount.
quiz.sure_quit: Are You Sure Want To Quit?`
quiz.quit_desc: if you quit You will win {0}
